sn35.25:1.1: “Sabbam abhinna parinna pahanaya vo, bhikkhave, dhammam desessami.
sn35.25:1.3: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sabbam abhinna parinna pahanaya dhammo?
sn35.25:1.4: Cakkhum, bhikkhave, abhinna parinna pahatabbam, rupa abhinna parinna pahatabba, cakkhuvinnanam abhinna parinna pahatabbam, cakkhusamphasso abhinna parinna pahatabbo, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi abhinna parinna pahatabbam …pe…
sn35.25:1.6: jivha abhinna parinna pahatabba, rasa abhinna parinna pahatabba, jivhavinnanam abhinna parinna pahatabbam, jivhasamphasso abhinna parinna pahatabbo, yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi abhinna parinna pahatabbam.
sn35.25:1.8: mano abhinna parinna pahatabbo, dhamma abhinna parinna pahatabba, manovinnanam abhinna parinna pahatabbam, manosamphasso abhinna parinna pahatabbo, yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi abhinna parinna pahatabbam.
sn35.25:1.9: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, sabbam abhinna parinna pahanaya dhammo”ti.
